H0.text: What term is given to a piece of artwork that is painted directly onto a wall or architectural feature . Fresco

H1.text: What term is given to a piece of artwork that is painted directly onto a wall or architectural feature . Wall Painting

H2.text: What term is given to a piece of artwork that is painted directly onto a wall or architectural feature . Architectural Art

H3.text: What term is given to a piece of artwork that is painted directly onto a wall or architectural feature . MURAL

A4.text: A mural is any piece of graphic artwork that is painted or applied directly to a wall, ceiling or other permanent substrate.

A5.text: The word mural is a Spanish adjective that is used to refer to what is attached to a wall. The term mural later became a noun.
